data: The note Q2 Product Sync Meeting covers discussion of features for the Q2 release, timeline adjustments, and resource allocation.
The note Q2 Product Sync Meeting includes an agreement to finalize the feature list by June 10.
The note Q2 Product Sync Meeting includes a decision to allocate two additional engineers to the Q2 release.
The note Q2 Product Sync Meeting instructs the update of the roadmap document.
The note Q2 Product Sync Meeting assigns Alice to draft the requirements specification.
The note Q2 Product Sync Meeting assigns Bob to update the project plan.
The note Q2 Product Sync Meeting schedules the next sync meeting on June 15.
